channel.title: lkrg kill onion-grater
channel.description:
Every about 30 seconds lkrg kills the onion-gratter process and it restarts
kernel: LKRG: ALERT: DETECT: Task: seccomp mode corruption (expected 2 vs. actual 3) for pid 19404, name onion-grater host kernel: LKRG: ALERT: BLOCK: Task: Killing pid 19404, name onion-grater
